ComicInfo.Summary:
END OF STORY ARC
The past, present, and future collide, and Oliver Harrison's life will forever be changed! Will the decades-long battle over the ashes of Everkeep end here, or have we only seen the beginning of an inferno? The cataclysmic extra-length conclusion to our first VANISH storyline is here!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 11:53:44. [CVDB998043] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 06:47:21. [Issue ID 2551482]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ryan Stegman,V Ken Marion,Ryan Stegman,V Ken Marion
ComicInfo.Inker: Ryan Stegman,V Ken Marion,Ryan Stegman,V Ken Marion
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Daniel Warren Johnson,J. P. Mayer,Michael Spicer,Riley Rossmo,Ryan Stegman,Sonia Oback
